title: Capturing immediate feedback in the classroom: An embedded action research study

title: A new use for practitioners in teaching negotiation
authors: BI Groth, S Glevoll - Negotiation Journal
excerpt: This article examines the role that practitioners as guest lecturers have traditionally played in the teaching of negotiation.
